EditorData.stateContext: Doesn't necessarily play on seeing boat. Wulbren could use this line without freeing the tieflings or after freeing the tieflings, for instance.

EditorData.NodeContext: leaving the player behind to die as she hops on the boat and leaves

EditorData.stateContext: Guards have sounded the alarm. The prisoners hear this.

Text.Value: What are you doing? Get to the boat, or I'm gone.

EditorData.NodeContext: preparing the leave without the player, who is caught in combat - yelling

EditorData.stateContext: If a character was on the way to the boat and couldn't leave because of various reasons,

Text.Value: We've gotten away with this. So let's get away.

EditorData.NodeContext: tense and annoyed as she waits by the boat - aware a guard could pass at any moment
running frantically, way out of absolute's reach (her character teleports off screen) is just ahead.

EditorData.stateContext: IN COMBAT. One person signals that they have to defend the boat.

Text.Value: Damn it all, can anything go right? Hurry - every guard in Moonrise heard that.

EditorData.NodeContext: alarm is blaring in the middle of her panicked escape from prison

Text.Value: Blast it all - I don't fancy swimming. This way!

EditorData.NodeContext: gets to a pier - it's a dead end (boat is gone). Trying not to panic as she finds her way out.

Text.Value: Boat's ready to go - with or without you.

EditorData.NodeContext: preparing the leave without the player, who is caught in combat - yelling

Text.Value: What's the problem here? Let's go!

EditorData.NodeContext: tense and annoyed as she waits by the boat - aware a guard could pass at any moment

Text.Value: Keep the bastards off me!  I'll take care of the boat.

EditorData.NodeContext: on knees frantically trying to untie the boat as player fights off guards
running for her life, trying to keep calm

Text.Value: There! That boat's our way off this rock.

EditorData.NodeContext: sees a way out of the hellscape prison she's trapped in. Yelling in hope and detemination

EditorData.stateContext: Character is about to disappear out of sight outside the tower, past the docks area.
OUT OF COMBAT. Another character is nearby and this character is idling by.
IN COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under a LOT of stress.

EditorData.logicalname: NIMBLE: Boat leaves after this line

EditorData.NodeContext: boat is free, fleeing from the middle of a massive fight

Text.Value: Pray to your Absolute, bastard. You'll meet Her before you touch that boat.

EditorData.NodeContext: just started combat, furious and determined

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under stress.

Text.Value: There must be a way out!

EditorData.NodeContext: running for her life, trying to keep calm

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Running for their life to whatever escape point they may reach. It could be the boat, it could be the pier outside.

Text.Value: Damn it, what are these chains made of?

EditorData.NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

Text.Value: Bloody thing - I've almost got it.

EditorData.NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

Text.Value: Hold on - this thing is chained up.

EditorData.NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

Text.Value: I don't fancy meeting any passing guard - we need to leave.

EditorData.NodeContext: tense and annoyed as she waits by the boat - aware a guard could pass at any moment

Synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.
